name: realestate1
description: This is a real estate website project.

scripts.dev: browser-sync start --server 'dist' --browser 'google chrome' --files 'dist' --ignore 'node_modules' --no-notify & chokidar '**/*.html' 'assets/**/*' -c 'npm run build' --initial --ignore 'dist/**' --ignore 'node_modules/**'
